name: defect-seg
description: This program creates some files that allows the user to visualize and evaluate the surface defects that were automatically detected and fixed by the topology correction program.

output-files.description: Defects summary with ID and number of vertices for left hemisphere.
output-files.name: Left Defects Summary

output-files.description: Fixed defect labels on the left hemisphere surface.
output-files.name: Left Defect Labels Fix

output-files.description: Binary labels for fixed defects on the left hemisphere.
output-files.name: Left Defect Labels Fix Binary

output-files.description: Annotation file for defects without fixes on the left hemisphere.
output-files.name: Left Defects No-Fix Annotation

output-files.description: Annotation file for defects with fixes on the left hemisphere.
output-files.name: Left Defects Fix Annotation

output-files.description: Statistics summary of defects indicating area and average thickness on the left hemisphere.
output-files.name: Left Defects Stats

output-files.description: Defects summary with ID and number of vertices for right hemisphere.
output-files.name: Right Defects Summary

output-files.description: Fixed defect labels on the Right hemisphere surface.
output-files.name: Right Defect Labels Fix

output-files.description: Binary labels for fixed defects on the right hemisphere.
output-files.name: Right Defect Labels Fix Binary

output-files.description: Annotation file for defects without fixes on the right hemisphere.
output-files.name: Right Defects No-Fix Annotation

output-files.description: Annotation file for defects with fixes on the right hemisphere.
output-files.name: Right Defects Fix Annotation

output-files.description: Statistics summary of defects indicating area and average thickness on the right hemisphere.
output-files.name: Right Defects Stats

author: FreeSurfer Developers
